string-array.name: lawandorder
string-array.item: No close by police station in my area.
Rowdiness in on the rise in the neighbourhood.
My area feels very insecure.
judgements are dragging for long , improve the judiciary.
police station not well maintained, gives gloomy feeling.
court compounds not well maintained.
police station staff not co-operative.
Quality of lawyers detriorating
courts are becoming totally unaffordable do something.
Increase constable/Inspector salary ,, bribes on rise.
police is not working to hard to reach to people.
High level of distrust on police.
should not be there a police awareness day , once in 3 months , where citizen should be encouraged to review there police stations , if they are happy with service of staff.
court system sucks, i want to bow out of contract of signing the constitution.
should not there be a court awareness day , once in 3 months , where citizens should be encouraged to review there courts , to check that they are happy with service of the staff.
@string/otherTypeOfComplaint

string-array.name: water
string-array.item: No municipality water in this area.
we have to heavily rely on tankers for water supply, please look into it.
water pipes leaking all over the place , water contamination dangers.
Municipality water tastes bad/oily.
Water department staff very rude .
Water department staff totally outdated .. Stoneage
water bills are too high.
water becoming totally inaffordable.

string-array.name: electricity
string-array.item: Enough these power cuts, increase power generation capacity.
No 24x7 power in my area.
power stations and transformers not well maintained,making my area look dirty.
transformers unprotected. Blast every now and then .
powerlines are hanging too low in my neighbourhood.
Electricity department staffs are rude.
Electricity department staff totally outdated .. Stoneage
power too costly , totally not affordable, reduce prices.
No initative from power department on educating customer.
why we do not have electricity awareness day, I want to know what I pay for.

this point has become congestion hotspot do something.
public buses not clean.

autorickshaw misbehavior menance here.

there are potholes everywhere on this road
road is in bad shape.
these Roads are dirty all the time do somethings

please increase the garbage truck capacity.
sewage is over flowing everywhere.
lot of manholes left open.
lot of garbage is left unaddressed.
my surrounding has become a garbage yard , please take care of it.
garbage has made environment like hell , is this the city we dreamt of.
